sentence.Network_en: Ignorance of people brings fear, fear of the unknown.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们的无知会带来恐惧，对未知事物的恐惧。

sentence.Network_en: Her ignorance of the area put her at a decided disadvantage.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对该地区一无所知，这显然对她不利。

sentence.Network_en: I was alarmed by his naivety and ignorance of international affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对国际事务缺乏经验且无知，这很让我吃惊。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... prognostic a 预兆的n.征兆 ignorance n 无知，愚昧 ignoramus n 不学无术的人.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... prognostic a 预兆的n.征兆 ignorance n 无知，愚昧 ignoramus n 不学无术的人.
无明 (Ignorance)：不明真谛之义，特别是指不明空性，对万事万物存在的真正模式的无知。无常 (Impermanence)： 指万事万物变动 …
英语谐音背单词_百度知道 ... gap   n. 缺口，裂口；间隔，空白；差距 ignorance  n. 无知，愚昧；不知道 javelin  n. 标枪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin ignorantia, from ignorant- 'not knowing' (see ignorant)

entry.def: Ignorance of something is lack of knowledge about it.

example.ex: I am embarrassed by my complete ignorance of history...
example.tran: 我对历史一无所知,这让我很难堪。

example.ex: There is so much ignorance about mental illness...
example.tran: 人们对精神疾病很不了解。

means.word_mean: 1. the lack of knowledge or education

auth_sentence.content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was astonished at the appalling ignorance displayed therein.

auth_sentence.content: The dark side reigns in a sea of ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dark side reigns in a sea of ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dark side reigns in a sea of ignorance.

auth_sentence.content: Ignorance is bliss but this case is an exception.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ignorance is bliss but this case is an exception.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ignorance is bliss but this case is an exception.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
stems_affixes.word_buile: accept接受,承诺+ance物品,性质,状况→n.接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
stems_affixes.word_buile: appear出现+ance物品,性质,状况→n.出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
apply应用+ance物品,性质,状况→appliance用具,器具
assist援助,帮助+ance物品,性质,状况→n.协助,援助,补助
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
disturb扰乱,防碍+ance物品,性质,状况→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
forbear忍受+ance物品,性质,状况→n.自制,忍耐
guide指导+ance物品,性质,状况→n.指导,领导
ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ance物品,性质,状况→ignorance无知,愚昧
persevere坚持+ance物品,性质,状况→n.坚持

resemble[v.像,类似]+ance物品,性质,状况→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
venge惩罚+ance物品,性质,状况→n.报复,报仇,复仇

Sentence.sentence: But the fact that such a violation is "unintentional" does not excuse the misconduct, Ignorance is not a defense.

sentences.en: If he did wrong, it was from ignorance.
sentences.cn: 如果他做错了, 那是由于无知。

jushi.english: She pretended ignorance about the accident.
jushi.chinese: 她装作不知道这起事故。

jushi.english: Tom pleaded ignorance of the law.
jushi.chinese: 汤姆以不熟悉法律为借口。

jushi.english: Poverty, disease and ignorance remain major world problems.
jushi.chinese: 贫困、疾病和无知仍是世界主要问题。
